body:
@Weenis Lord brother try reading Inside of Cave of Obscenity... the premise is quite close you are commented haha....
" In a world where the Hero and the Demon king no longer exist. A world where monsters brought by the demon king is dwindling in numbers and fear brought by monsters slowly forgotten by the people, in an abandoned cave, a new monster is born and soon will bring terror to this peaceful world."
This is summary hahaha...
Btw its a novel.
Somehow, in an unknown world in an unknown cave, there was coincidentally a super hot chick and a tentacle slime monster fucking.
Oh God!!! I love this series!!
